motions.title: Amend Agenda to Move Recognition Item
motions.description: Motion to amend the agenda to move item number 3 (Special Recognition of Bill McCahan) to immediately follow item number 1.

motions.title: 2024 Millage Rate Adoption
motions.description: Approval of resolution establishing the 2024 millage rate of 3.04 mills after third public hearing.

motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of June 10, 26, and 27, 2024 meeting minutes.

motions.title: American Rescue Plan Timeline Extension
motions.description: Approval of timeline extension for American Rescue Plan grants to December 31, 2024.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for real estate and legal discussion.
